title: SAMSUNG 24-Inch S43GC Series Business Essential Computer Monitor, IPS Panel, Height Adjustable Stand, Triple Input, New DisplayPort, 100Hz, AMD FreeSync, Advanced Eye Care LS24C432GANXZA, 2024
description: Samsung's S4 Series Monitor features multiple inputs including an all-new Display Port. Get more done faster, from connecting with colleagues during video calls to working on creative projects. Experience vivid colors across the entire screen with the IPS Panel, even when shifting angles. Featuring 100Hz refresh rate so you won't miss a thing, even with fast-paced workdays. AMD FreeSync™ keeps monitor and graphics card in perfect sync, reducing image tearing. TÜV-certified technology reduces eye strain, and the ergonomically designed height-adjustable monitor creates a comfortable environment in which to work and play. *Default refresh rate is set to 60Hz and may be adjusted to 100Hz in the monitor's settings.
